General.Name: China National Gold Group Gold Jewellery Co Ltd
General.Description: China National Gold Group Gold Jewellery Co.,Ltd. produces and sells gold jewelry. It offers gold products, including gold bars, gold jewelry, and gold products. K gold jewelry products comprising jewelry made of K gold, platinum, silver, etc., as well as inlaid jewelry products, such as diamonds, pearls, jade, and colored gemstones. The company also provides gold watches, K gold watches, platinum watches, precious metals Inlaid watches, and metal smart electronic wearable devices; metal commemorative coins and chapters; recycling of old gold and silver materials; and wholesale and retail of office supplies, gifts, and handicrafts. In addition, it is involved in the road transportation of general goods, storage of precious metals, and logistics services, as well as exhibition services. The company sells its products through directly operated stores, and franchise stores, as well as online. China National Gold Group Gold Jewellery Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. China National Gold Group Gold Jewellery Co.,Ltd operates as a subsidiary of China National Gold Group Co., Ltd.

1.Name: Mr. Jun  Chen
1.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
